title: Why the ‘OG’ Battle at E3 Saxo Classic Will Be Better Without Pogačar
content:
Tour de Hoody: Flanders Week opens without cycling's superstar, but it's a chance to revisit the Mathieu van der Poel-Wout van Aert rivalry.

Read the full article at Why the ‘OG’ Battle at E3 Saxo Classic Will Be Better Without Pogačar on Velo.
author: ahood
